_source.short_desc: ClockShark is the leading mobile GPS time tracking & scheduling software for local construction, field service, and contractors.
_source.long_desc: ClockShark is the leading mobile GPS time tracking and scheduling software built for field service, contractors and construction businesses that want a simpler way to track employee time, run payroll quickly and accurately, and understand job costs. Over 8,000 customers have replaced the hassle of paper timesheets with software that makes it easier to run their business and keeps accountants happy. Don't take our word for it, start a free trial today!
_source.pricing_details:
Basic Plan Monthly
$3.00/monthly per employee, plus $20.00 base price per account. Or get two months free if you pay annually.

Standard Plan Monthly
$6.00/ monthly per employee, plus $30.00 base price per account. Or get two months free if you pay annually.

Pro Plan Monthly
$8.00/ monthly per employee, plus $50.00 base price per account. Or get two months free if you pay annually.
_source.target_audience: Construction, field service, and franchise companies that want to get rid of paper time sheets, but most time trackers aren't built for their industry. ClockShark is built for you!

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (For a Limited Time, Save Up to 55%, Sale Ends 12/3!) is an end-to-end construction software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your construction business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: Procore Estimating Software is purpose built for the construction industry. Adjust material prices, labor units, & profit margins.
related_products.features: Upload plans and perform a quantity takeoff using a customizable database of parts, assemblies, equipment, and services. Leverage auto-count and plan overlay to speed up the takeoff process. Takeoff data flows directly to construction estimating software ensuring ease of use. Simply adjust material prices, labor units, profit margins, and create a customer-facing construction proposal.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud based project management tool with features that include scheduling, estimating, bidding, job costing, selections and many more.
related_products.features: Buildertrend is the No. 1, cloud-based construction project management software for homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors. Since 2006, we have empowered the construction industry with a better way to build. More than 1 million users across the globe have chosen Buildertrend as their platform for real-time collaboration. Our software helps construction professionals complete projects while reducing delays, eliminating communication errors and increasing customer satisfaction.

related_products.short_desc: Bid & Win More Profitable Work in Less Time with STACK! Cloud-based, Free Support/Training. Create Your Free Account Today!
related_products.features:
STACK takeoff and estimating software is easy-to-use, packed with features to speed up your bid process and cloud-based, so you can collaborate with your team in real-time from anywhere. Best of all, access to STACK is now FREE!

 Access project plans anytime, anywhere, from any device
 Bid more work, in less time.
 Eliminate costly estimating errors.
 Leverage a library of pre-built & custom material databases.
 Win more profitable work!

related_products.short_desc: Web-based residential construction estimating software to handle estimates, bids, contracts, selections and more.
related_products.features: CoConstruct is the #1 highest-rated residential construction estimating tool for custom builders and remodelers. It?s the only all-in-one tool for custom home builders and remodelers that allows you to enter your data once, and have that information flow through the estimate to the specs, selections, bid requests, proposals, change orders, purchase orders, and budget ? including a full integration with QuickBooks.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) helps general & specialty contractors organize their books, complete tasks faster with automated approvals, reminders, batch invoicing & customized access by role in the field or the office. Turn estimates into invoices & track project profitability with advanced reporting, track employees' hours with our TSheets integration, and use our Intuit Field Service Management (IFSM) add-on for work order scheduling & dispatch system. All with 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Estimating, Project Management and Productivity Tools for Construction Projects.
related_products.features: Discover how over 500,000 pros in 75 countries estimate faster and more accurately with UDA ConstructionSuite. Designed for general contractors, residential builders, and subcontractors, ConstructionSuite manages over $65 billion in projects and features real estimating with industry-specific tools like RSMeans Cost Data, AIA payment applications, estimate templates, true bi-directional QuickBooks integration, Change Order management, and integration with leading CAD programs. Get started today.

related_products.short_desc: For infrastructure contractors bidding projects ranging from $1,000 to over $1 billion.
related_products.features: Used by more than 50,000 estimators and 48 of the ENR Top 50 heavy civil contractors, HeavyBid estimating software quickly and accurately prepares a detailed cost estimate based on previous work; and then easily convert it into a bid. Plus, compare subcontractor and supplier quotes and conduct self-perform versus subcontractor analysis.

related_products.short_desc:

Be more professional, profitable, organized, and efficient. 

Free consultation. Free trial.

related_products.short_desc: Houzz Pro is the #1 construction estimating and business management solution for contractors.
related_products.features: Houzz Pro is the #1 construction estimating and business management solution for contractors. Get an all-in-one solution that spans the full customer lifecycle, including estimates, takeoffs, marketing, CRM, 3D floor plans, project management, collaboration, online invoicing & payments, QuickBooks integration, and a client portal. Start a free trial to see why thousands of Pros trust Houzz Pro to grow & manage their business. Plans are available for all business sizes starting at $49/month.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by +850,000 pros as the all-in-one construction management software designed to help finish jobs on time and under budget.
related_products.features: ConstructionOnline is trusted by +850,000 pros as the all-in-one construction management software designed to help finish jobs on time and under budget. Increase profits with integrated estimating & takeoff, change order tracking, and client selections. Avoid delays with Gantt chart scheduling and centralized communication. Real-time dashboards help you and your team make informed decisions and keep projects on track and on target. Get your demo and see how to build better, faster & smarter.

similar_products.short_desc: Square Takeoff is a 100% cloud-based takeoff and estimating solution for small to medium-sized subcontractors, builders, and suppliers.
similar_products.features: Square Takeoff is a 100% cloud-based takeoff and estimating solution for small- to medium-sized subcontractors, builders, and suppliers for residential or commercial needs. From general contracting to plumbing, we support any trade on PC/iOS or mobile devices. Upload digital blueprints and share or make changes to the job from anywhere. Manage your project bids, calculate square footage, materials, and labor, and set notifications and reminders for smooth project collaboration.

similar_products.short_desc: RSMeans Data Online (save 15% when bundling training) is cloud-based access to North America's leading construction cost database.
similar_products.features: RSMeans Data Online (save 15% when bundling training) provides accurate and up-to-date construction estimating cost data that helps owners, architects, cost engineers and contractors precisely project and control the cost of projects. Create square foot, assembly and unit line item estimates and share them with ease. Stay on top of price changes by setting alerts on commonly referenced materials and tasks. Project costs up to 3 years in the future with our industry-leading Predictive Cost Model.

Trimble Accubid Anywhere is the first of its kind, a fully hosted, hassle-free IT experience. Connect from anywhere at any time, allowing you to focus on what you do best, win work! 

Accubid Anywhere offers robust estimating features such as true multiuser and multi-branch support, allowing seamless collaboration between departments both simultaneously and without restrictions. Finally, fully integrated pricing technology gives you the tools to ensure up-to-date pricing for all your projects.

similar_products.short_desc: Save Time & Win More Bids with ProEst Construction Estimating Software

Our online platform combines CRM, cost estimating, digital takeoffs, bid-day analysis, and reporting in a single powerful solution -- all with 24/7 access from any computer or mobile device.

similar_products.short_desc: InEight  Construction Estimating software helps you create more accurate and timely project estimates and improve the project ROI.
similar_products.features: InEight Construction Estimating software includes industry-leading features that are optimized for construction cost estimating and construction budget management. Our software allows your teams to have complete control of construction cost management. We can help you increase by 25% the amount of work estimated by your current staff. With our software, you can streamline the construction estimating process and deliver more projects on time and on budget.

similar_products.short_desc: Buildxact is a simple, online estimating and project management tool for builders that allows you to estimate quickly & easily.
similar_products.features:
Accurate estimates in a fraction of the time. 
Create professional quotes quickly. Turn estimates into professional quotes incorporating your branding with just the click of a button. Impress your customers with detailed specifications, images and breakdowns of any PC/PS items.

Estimating software designed for residential builders and remodelers. Do on-screen takeoffs and connect with your dealer for live pricing. Super easy-to-learn, with training included in your subscription.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Architecture software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Architecture tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Architecture software is project management software designed for the architecture, construction, and engineering industries. Contractors, architects and engineers use these tools to develop and refine designs for new products, as well as manage current projects and job proposals. Architecture software is related to Construction Estimating software, Construction CRM software, and Construction Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction accounting software automates accounting, job costing and loan servicing functions for the construction, architecture, and engineering industries. Construction accounting software offer comprehensive management and reporting tools for construction breakdowns, budgets, expenditures, change orders, cost-over-runs and completion progress. Additionally, construction accounting provides standard monthly accounting available from your traditional construction accounting system. Accounting software is related to Construction Estimating software, Construction CRM software and Construction Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction CRM software encompasses Customer Relationship Management applications targeted specifically to the construction industry. It allows building professionals to not only store information about their clients and potential customers but also to track ongoing projects and sales efforts. Construction CRM software is related to Construction Management software, Construction Accounting software, Architectural Drafting software, Construction Estimating software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction management and construction project management software coordinates business processes for contractors and builders. Organizations use construction management systems to enable collaborative workflow and data access, integrating multiple teams and office locations into a shared work environment. These building software solutions also provide scheduling and real time completion data, including: monitoring of product status, start and finish dates, budgets and expenditures. They also typically offer tools for data organization and presentation, such as construction templates. Construction Management software is related to Construction Accounting software, Architectural Drafting software, Construction CRM software and Construction Estimating software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Home Builder software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Home Builder tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Home Builder software provides construction management solutions specialize for residential builders and contractors. Features typically include job costing, sales and inventory management, scheduling and hours tracking, and accounting tools. Home builders may also be interested in Construction Estimating software, Construction Accounting software, Architecture software, Construction Management software, and Construction CRM software.

pricing_plans.name: Basic
pricing_plans.description: Refreshingly easy time and location tracking for up to five people. Annual plan is also available. Both plans feature an additional $20/mo. base fee.

pricing_plans.name: Standard
pricing_plans.description: Time tracking with scheduling, geofencing and administrative features designed for small businesses. Additional $30/mo. base fee. Annual plan is also available

pricing_plans.name: Pro
pricing_plans.description: Robust time tracking, scheduling, and time off management features for growing businesses and established multi-location businesses. Additional $50/mo. base fee. Annual plan is also available.

category_features.definition: Track and manage employee's work hours to improve payroll accuracy

category_features.name: Variable Workforce
category_features.definition: Utilize third party services to cover unforeseen labor needs

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Schedule jobs, coordinate teams, track time and track projects, all in one place.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Time is proudly part of the QuickBooks family, and works alongside leading accounting tools like QuickBooks Online, Xero and MYOB. Schedule jobs, coordinate teams, track time and track projects, all in one place."

related_products.short_desc: Automate your client bookings, cancellations, reminders & payments using the worlds friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: Meet the personal assistant for your schedule (only better) that works 24/7, behind the scenes to fill your calendar and take work off your plate. From the moment clients book with you, Squarespace is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments so your day-to-day runs smoother even as business get busier. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Employee scheduling software for tracking team availability, evenly allocate tasks and prevent overload, burnouts and missed deadlines.
related_products.features: Clockify is employee and project scheduling software helping you track work hours, create staff work schedules, see everyone's availability, make adjustments when allocating tasks, and control costs and overall budgets. Individual time entries become valuable data about how each day is spent and give you insights on your employees' productivity habits. You can export reports on each working week and customize which data you want to include.

related_products.short_desc: Build custom solutions on monday.com Work OS so you can schedule everything your employees are working on at a glance.
related_products.features: On monday.com Work OS, managers can easily assign tasks and track the progress of any ongoing projects at a glance so they have a real-time source of truth for all of their team's work. Implement the platform's timeline view to schedule your team's work so you never miss a deadline. Finally, generate graphs directly on the platform to visualize how team members allocate time and leverage insights to prioritize more effectively.

related_products.short_desc: Calendly is the world's #1 scheduling tool. It eliminates the hassle of back-and-forth emails and syncs with your entire team.
related_products.features: Calendly makes scheduling meetings easy and efficient, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. Already recognized as the intuitive scheduling leader for more than 10 million people around the world, Calendly also offers extended capabilities for teams with powerful collaboration functionality, robust administration controls, and enterprise-grade security and compliance. Integrations with Zoom, Salesforce, Google, Microsoft, Slack, & more.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a remote work management software with Gantt charts, performance reports, resource management, and 400+ integrations.
related_products.features: Wrike is a work management software trusted by 20,000+ companies and two million users worldwide. Improve your employee scheduling using resource allocation, custom-built request forms, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, performance reports, and workload overviews all in one place. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to accelerate your everyday processes. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates, and more. Work smarter, not harder with Wrike.

related_products.short_desc: The leading employee scheduling app for agencies, studios and firms. Trusted by brands including Ogilvy, Metalab and Buzzfeed.
related_products.features: Since 2012, Float has been helping the world's top teams including BuzzFeed, Havas and Ogilvy manage their employee and resource schedules. Assign and manage tasks with ease, whilst having a clear, single view of your team's workload. Get live updates of your projects and track resource availability including sick leave, paid time off and public holidays. With drag-and-drop functionality, flexible search and filter features, Float makes scheduling your team simple. Start your 30 day free trial.

related_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
related_products.features:
When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. 
Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based online booking, scheduling, point of sale and marketing software - everything you need to run your spa or salon better.
related_products.features: Tired of spending your days focusing on chasing your employees around and manually writing down schedules? Make life easier for your clients, your staff, and yourself with Bookers employee scheduling software that brings together your online booking, staff scheduling, CRM, point of sale, marketing and retention tools, all on one platform. With Bookers cloud-based software solutions, youll be able to access your business anywhere, anytime. See Booker in action with a free demo!

similar_products.short_desc: The employee scheduling software that keeps things simple. Easily schedule and dispatch remote and non-desk employees.
similar_products.features: Take back your time with an employee scheduler that can foresee scheduling conflicts. Know exactly when employees are free to be scheduled, or open shifts only to chosen staffers. Save what works for you as a template and then duplicate it or customize another set of shifts. With timely notifications employees always know in advance exactly where the week and month will take them. Put a stop to confusion with error-free scheduling supported by attached instructions and an accurate time clock!

similar_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust employee scheduling, communication, and time tracking tool built specifically for restaurants. Free for 14 days!
similar_products.features: 7shifts helps restaurants schedule more efficiently with intuitive scheduling, communication, time tracking, and compliance tools. The intuitive drag & drop schedule builder automatically factors in availability, time-off, overtime, and compliance, and managers can easily integrate their POS to ensure they hit their labor targets. With a free app for staff to submit availability requests and swap shifts, building schedules has never been so easy.

similar_products.short_desc: Build custom solutions on monday.com Work OS so you can schedule everything your employees are working on at a glance.
similar_products.features: On monday.com Work OS, managers can easily assign tasks and track the progress of any ongoing projects at a glance so they have a real-time source of truth for all of their team's work. Implement the platform's timeline view to schedule your team's work so you never miss a deadline. Finally, generate graphs directly on the platform to visualize how team members allocate time and leverage insights to prioritize more effectively.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy schedule builder. The team always has their up-to-date schedule. Know who is available to work. Set policies around time-off.
similar_products.features:
Homebase makes work easier for 100,000+ small (but
mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

similar_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
similar_products.features:
When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. 
Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

similar_products.short_desc: MakeShift makes scheduling, time tracking and communicating with employees a pain free process? And, businesses love it!
similar_products.features:
MakeShift is the go-to employee scheduling solution for companies looking to save time, offer flexibility, increase engagement and drive growth. It lets you build schedules faster, track time & attendance more accurately and communicate with employees in real-time.

Our customers enjoy fewer unfilled shifts, more time to focus on strategy, better work-life balance, happier employees and a healthier bottom line. 

It's PeopleFirst, PainFree scheduling. And businesses love it!

similar_products.short_desc: Imagine posting a schedule, enjoying a restful night's sleep, then waking up with a full schedule and happy staff. Stress Free.
similar_products.features:
Introducing EasyShifts. EasyShifts was created by an RN. We understand how important your job is to the world. Since 2008 we've helped hospitals, nursing homes, assisted living facilities tame their unruly schedules.

You need all your shifts to be filled. Set it and forget it. But, your current scheduling solution (pen/paper or fancy spreadsheet) isn't cutting it. To make matters worse, your team is frustrated too!

Request a personalized demo and see how EasyShifts can work for you.

similar_products.short_desc: Humanity is the leading cloud-based employee scheduling platform that accelerates schedule creation by up to 80 percent.
similar_products.features: Humanity Scheduling, powered by TCP Software, is an easy-to-use and accessible subscription-based employee scheduling solution hosted in the cloud. Organizations can use this tool to effectively create law-compliant and demand-based schedules, automate the scheduling process, manage conflicts, generate reports and more. With Humanity Scheduling, organizations can manage their labor resources in a more efficient manner and save hours from employee scheduling automation.

similar_products.short_desc: Build accurate plans and forecast models that enable scheduling flexibility, even in complex environments.
similar_products.features: With Verint Workforce Management, build accurate plans and forecast models that enable scheduling flexibility, even in complex environments. Create employee schedules to help meet service levels consistently and cost-effectively, while accommodating employee needs for flexibility and telework. Provide a single, unified solution that can be deployed in the cloud or on-premises to help balance customer and employee satisfaction with cost constraints in your contact center.

similar_products.short_desc: Calendly is the world's #1 scheduling tool. It eliminates the hassle of back-and-forth emails and syncs with your entire team.
similar_products.features: Calendly makes scheduling meetings easy and efficient, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. Already recognized as the intuitive scheduling leader for more than 10 million people around the world, Calendly also offers extended capabilities for teams with powerful collaboration functionality, robust administration controls, and enterprise-grade security and compliance. Integrations with Zoom, Salesforce, Google, Microsoft, Slack, & more.

similar_products.short_desc: TCP's employee scheduling brings together dynamic scheduling capabilities and an intuitive user experience that empowers managers.
similar_products.features: Building and maintaining schedules is a large part of workforce management, which is why our solution has multiple dynamic scheduling features designed to make it as easy as possible. Build a single schedule and apply it to all employees or have individualized schedules throughout. Either way our solution is made to enable any configuration you might need. We offer an array of reports, occurrence features and more to make your operation as easy and efficient as possible.

similar_products.short_desc: Celayix offers the best employee scheduling and time tracking to fit the needs and complexity of today's modern and dynamic workforce.
similar_products.features:
Celayix delivers a powerful best of breed solution as the best employee scheduling, time and attendance, and communications tool for todays modern workforce.

With Celayix you can cut the time it takes create a shift schedule by 95% as well as reduce the costs, effort and headaches of managing your workforce all while seeing immediate benefits of eliminated overtime, reduced turnover, and improved client satisfaction. 

Get started with our 14-day free trial now!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scheduling software automates the scheduling of events, employees, rooms and other resources. Organizations use these applications to manage the planning of internal and external activities. Typically Scheduling software provides tools such as a shared calendar providing real-time project, task, employee and resource scheduling as well as a variety of forecasting, allocation and resource management features. Often other details, such as resource categorization, location details, timesheet records and employee skill-sets can be edited, updated and managed from the scheduling interface. Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Facility Management software and Appointment Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.

pricing_plans.name: Basic
pricing_plans.description: Refreshingly easy time and location tracking for up to five people. Annual plan is also available. Both plans feature an additional $20/mo. base fee.

pricing_plans.name: Standard
pricing_plans.description: Time tracking with scheduling, geofencing and administrative features designed for small businesses. Additional $30/mo. base fee. Annual plan is also available

pricing_plans.name: Pro
pricing_plans.description: Robust time tracking, scheduling, and time off management features for growing businesses and established multi-location businesses. Additional $50/mo. base fee. Annual plan is also available.
